name: Egg Catch!
description:
Update: I fixed a couple of bugs (removed the diagonal step glitch) and made some minor improvements (added quick retry and quit buttons, replacing the useless pause menu, tweaked the scoring system, etc).

This is my entry for /agdg/'s Loli Jam.

In this simple puzzle game, you play as Molly, a little girl on a hunt for Easter Eggs.

There a catch (pun totally intended) though: the number of steps you can make in each direction are limited. Your objective in each level is to collect all the eggs and reach the goal before you run out of steps!

As if this wasn't enough, there are three types of special tiles to pay attention to:

  1. The Jump tile (red): once you step on it, you will make another step in the same direction (for free)
  2. The double tile (green): Stepping on it will cost 2 steps instead of 1
  3. The block tile (blue): After you step on it a certain number of times, a wall block will spawn!

Will you make it to the last level?

Special thanks to the anons who helped with music and level design/debugging.
